hello!: I have a new install of 12.04 desktop 32 bit, and I can't get my media keys to have any effect. I checked and the keys are properly bound n the keyboard settings page. What else might help me fix/troubleshoot this?
Try running "xev" and with the xev window in focus try pressing one of the media keys and see if it registers as an event (you'll have to watch the output in the terminal).
It does pop up with distinct events for each key.
